name: The Secret of San Francisco: Unique Art, Nature, Skyline and History of Great Chinatown
description:
If you like art I can take you to the
museums and galleries, such as Asian Art Museum, Yerba Buena Center for the
Arts and Fraenkel Gallery. The photography foundation where I am currently
working is Pier 24 photography foundation. It only accept people who makes
reservation for visiting, I can help you to make reservation and give you an
art guide into the best photography gallery in San Francisco.
